pl.put.poznan.transformer.tools

Class JsonToolsSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.put.poznan.transformer.tools.JsonToolsSelector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JsonTools, JsonToolsDecorator

    public class JsonToolsSelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements JsonToolsDecorator
    Decorator Implementation which decorate Component JsonTools. This class is responsible for filtering and selecting nodes in JSON file by given input data set.

      Class constructor, initializes jsonTools implementation.

      • modify

        public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode modify(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode json,
                                                      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> selected)
        Overrides modify function of JsonToolsDecorator. This function modifies actual Object JSON file by filtering and selecting with entered node's values.
        Specified by:
        modify in interface JsonToolsDecorator
        Parameters:
        json - JSON main node. JSON file in Object format.
        selected - Set of String data. Set of node's names to be selected.
        Returns:
        JSON main node. JSON file with selected values.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Throws exception when parameters set is invalid.
